short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to allow Ledger devices to use Ethereum Dapps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SpaceSuit lets you use Ethereum Dapps, such as CryptoKitties, ForkDelta or Aethia, from your Ledger hardware wallet. It aims for bug-for-bug compatibility with MetaMask, so anything that works with MetaMask should work with SpaceSuit.
